name: Mina Protocol (httpz) 🪶
fullText:
Introducing Anon Aadhaar in o1js 🧵
@minabuilders ported the original @PrivacyEthereum Anon Aadhaar concept to Mina — showing how users can prove facts like “I’m over 18” without revealing personal data.

Built with Mina’s zero knowledge tech for private, verifiable identity.

🔗
